name: GunFright
overview: NOW Y'ALL LISTEN UP! Seems we got ourselves a new Sheriff in town, reckons he gonna clear the town of the meanest and fastest Gun Totin' Bunch of Rootin' Tootin' Gun Slingers which ever did hit the Wild West, goes by the name of Sheriff Quickdraw. Yes Siree. Sheriff Quickdraw springs into action and within the blink f an eye, is away on his trusty steed Panto. Dang-Rabbit, go git thim villians, Sheriff Quickdraw! For One or Two Players
